en: Like a small boat on the ocean
Sending big waves into motion
Like how a single word can make a heart open
zh: 就像一句話能讓心敞開

en: I might only have one match, but I can make an explosion
zh: 我或許只有一根火柴，但能引發爆炸

en: And all those things I didn’t say
Were wrecking balls inside my brain
I will scream them loud tonight
Can you hear my voice this time?
zh: 這次你能聽見我的聲音嗎？

en: This is my fight song
Take back my life song
Prove I’m alright song
My power’s turned on
Starting right now I’ll be strong
I’ll play my fight song
And I don’t really care if nobody else believes
zh: 即使沒有人相信我也不在乎

en: Cause I’ve still got a lot of fight left in me
zh: 因為我仍有滿腔的鬥志

en: Losing friends and I’m chasing sleep
zh: 朋友離開而我追尋睡眠

en: Everybody’s worried about me
In too deep, say I’m in too deep
zh: 太過投入，他們說我陷太深

en: And it’s been two years, I miss my home
zh: 兩年過去了，我想念我的家

en: But there’s a fire burning in my bones
zh: 但我的骨子裡燃著火焰

en: Still believe, yeah I still believe
zh: 依然相信，是的我依然相信

en: This is my fight song
Take back my life song
Prove I’m alright song
My power’s turned on
Starting right now I’ll be strong
I’ll play my fight song
Cause I’ve still got a lot of fight left in me
zh: 因為我仍有滿腔的鬥志

en: A lot of fight left in me
zh: 還有許多鬥志在我心中
